input: Cities grow. Towns develop. Villages sustain.

I also included mentions of dangers like tunnel destruction, trenches breaking up land (land division), and fishless water where words are hard or too much override.
evaluation:

The output does not include any tags for emphasis. Overall, the output does not comply with the given instructions to format the text as HTML as per the description.
